targets.query:
current_wh = from(bucket: "sensors")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_sensors")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "solar/dtu/bkw/daily_yield")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
|> max()
|> last()
|> yield()

import "date"

current_wh = from(bucket: "sensors")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_sensors")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "solar/dtu/bkw/daily_yield")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
|> max()
|> last()
|> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

all_below = from(bucket: "sensors")
|> range(start: -10y)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_sensors")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "solar/dtu/bkw/daily_yield")
|> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] >= current_wh._value)
|> filter(fn: (r) => date.hour(t: r._time) == 0)
|> yield()

wh1 = from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: -10y)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "solar/dtu/bkw/port/1/energy")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> difference()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1m)
  |> yield()

wh1 = from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: -10y)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "solar/dtu/bkw/port/2/energy")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> difference()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1m)
  |> yield()
